arts.ttl: Maxence Caqueret set to complete Como medical ahead of move from Lyon

arts.sum: Pierre Lees-Melou remains absent for Stade Brestois as they host Olympique Lyonnais on Saturday evening. The Frenchman has not featured since coming off against AS Monaco towards the end of…

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Donyell Malen to Aston Villa, Nemanja Matic to Ipswich
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Donyell Malen to Aston Villa, Nemanja Matic to Ipswich Town and Kevin Schade to Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Como Boss Delivers Huge Transfer Update on Lyon Veteran
arts.sum: Como manager Cesc Fabregas addressed the media after last night's dramatic 1-1 draw against Lazio at the Stadio Olimpico. During his post-match chat with DAZN via TMW, Fabregas discussed several topics, including Nico Paz's injury. The post Como Boss Delivers Huge Transfer Update on Lyon Veteran appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
